description:
Lil’Pri are known as the mysterious stars. Ringo, Leila, and Natsuki are surprised by the unexpected attention but agree to “Try even harder to make everybody happy”. Sei, Dai, and Ryoku seem to be happy about the decision. But then they realize that only one of the princess change cards crucial for the transformation is left! Ringo and her friends are worried that they can only do the princess change one more time. That’s when Chris appears and delivers them a message from Wish. The message states that he wants them to appear on his show once again. The girls only have one card left, so Ringo and her friends get psyched to use the last card to amass a wealth of happiness tones and save Fairy Land in one last concerted effort, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さいごのひめチェン? ☆ぷりっ!
